Career Statement

I am a Chartered professional engineer with fifteen years of experience in the oil and gas industry. Five of these years were in a brownfields consultancy, conducting engineering design for Woodside assets such as the Karratha Gas Plant, Goodwyn A and North Rankin offshore platforms.  In this role I developed a deep technical understanding of mechanical engineering fundamentals; with a particular focus on static-equipment and integrity.

Following my time in engineering consultancy, I spent six years in an operational role, primarily for the MODEC Venture 11 FPSO. This gave me a broad exposure to most operation and maintenance activities for oil rig systems. Part of this role was the preparation and execution of a major shutdown construction activity at a Singapore shipyard. After decommissioning the facility in 2018, I moved on to preparation of tenders, regional support, and Operations Readiness and Assurance work for the Barossa, Dorado, and Sangomar FPSOs. During this time I also worked in New Zealand and Brazil.

I moved to Singapore in 2021 as the maintenance engineer for Sangomar FPSO. In this role, I developed maintenance philosophies, strategies, and Computerised Maintenance Management System (CMMS) data. Here I experienced the pain of bad data stemming from a lack of data governance at the data source. I was already experienced in software development by this point, so I started to think about how software can be used to improve engineering processes. I have since built several software applications related to the management of engineering data
I currently work as a DataOps Engineer (DataOps Specialist) within MODEC's Digital and Analytics department.

CMMS builder
Creation of a full stack web app to build functional location hierarchies.
Implementation of materialised path algorithms in order to efficiently traverse deep hierarchies with > 100,000 nodes.

Design and implementation of algorithms to selectively export and import branches from the tree to formatted Ms Excel tree representations, including utilisation of GUIDs to ensure that imported updates do not accidentally overwrite other data.
Development of a REST API to serve data from the backend to the frontend.

Design and implementation of a frontend single-page app (React) to display and edit tree data. The app responsively manages large tree structures by implementing lazy loading and pre-loading to N+2 node depth.
Tree builder module from web app

Development of a data model for process safety management, encompassing Major Accident Events, Performance Standards, Performance Criteria, Assurance Tasks, and Safety Critical Elements. Integration of this into the data model allows for full traceability from the Operational Assurance Tasks to the remainder of the CMMS data model.
The app is under ongoing development, demo / source code available upon request

This is a personal project, but included here to demonstrate experience with data management. The repo is private.
Similarpanda
This is a tool to compare two data tables, such as two revisions of spreadsheet. This tool was written in Python and Pandas, and can clearly identify:
New rows (ie, new records)
Deleted rows
Changed rows, including the before and after values of each cell.
New columns
Deleted columns
https://github.com/pretoriusdre/similarpanda
Languages used: Python
SimilarPanda example
Loadsheet
Designed, developed and deployed a cloud-based web app to validate Excel Spreasheets from engineering suppliers, and extract the data.
Generation of validation reports based on pre-defined schemas, eg checking string lengths, character encoding, column names, min/max values, catalogue of allowable values.
The app allows vendors to rectify mistakes prior to official submission to an engineering project.
Extracted data is (optionally) encrypted using asymmetric encryption, and made available via a REST API.
Languages and frameworks used: Python, Django, Javascript, HTML, CSS
https://www.loadsheet.io
This r√©sum√©
I designed and built this interactive resume. The rendering engine is written in Javascript / React, whilst the content is stored in a JSON hierarchy. Styling is achieved by using CSS.
The resume is designed to allow for opportunity to expand on certain ideas, and incorporate rich content, whilst still being able to be printed to a conventional A4 pdf.
